text: Daniel Owen Woolgar Jarvis, (born 30 November 1972) is a British Labour Party politician. From 1997 to 2011, he was in the Parachute Regiment, before being elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Barnsley Central in a by-election in 2011. He was elected as Mayor of the Sheffield City Region in 2018. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:People from Nottingham Category:Directly elected British mayors Category:People from South Yorkshire
title: Dan Jarvis
